import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import InputRange from 'react-input-range'; class Table extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { api: "", room1: false, room2: false, room3: false, room4: false, building1: false, building2: false, gfloor: false, floor1:false, floor2: false, floor3: false, floor4: false, floor5: false, floor6: false, bathroom1: false, bathroom2: false, minsurface: 0, maxsurface: 100, forsale: false, sold:false, }; this.callApi = this.callApi.bind(this); } //Call API callApi() { fetch( "https://marianadascalitei.dev.ascensys.ro/paltimsalestool/api/paltimapi.php",{ method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ type: "all", room1:"da", }), headers: { 'Content-type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8' }}) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((res) => this.setState({ api: res })) } componentDidMount() { this.callApi(); } handleCheckboxChange(e) { this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}, () => { this.sendRequest(); }) } handleSlider(e){ this.setState({surface: e.target.value}, () => { this.sendRequest(); }) } async sendRequest(){ await fetch( "https://marianadascalitei.dev.ascensys.ro/paltimsalestool/api/paltimapiSort.php",{ method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ type: "sort",room1:this.state.room1,room2:this.state.room2,room3:this.state.room3,room4:this.state.room4, building1:this.state.building1,building2:this.state.building2,gfloor:this.state.gfloor,floor1:this.state.floor1, floor2:this.state.floor2,floor3:this.state.floor3,floor4:this.state.floor4,floor5:this.state.floor5,floor6:this.state.floor6, bathroom1:this.state.bathroom1, bathroom2:this.state.bathroom2,surface: this.state.surface,forsale:this.state.forsale,sold:this.state.sold }), headers: { 'Content-type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8' }}) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((res) => this.setState({ api: res })) } render () { console.log(this.state) if(this.state.api !== ""){ return (
Filters

Surface : {this.state.minsurface}
Status

) } } } export default Table;
